pr_title: GraphQL QueryAnalysis enable with API key

added isSliderBarOpen user selection to the local store

timeline.bodyText: isn't "graphQLMaxComplexity" and "graphQLMaxDepth" string used in multiple places? if so can you add it to a string constant class and reuse?
